did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Modern Languages records
did.abstract: This is a collection of documents originating with the Xavier University Department of Modern Languages.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Department of Modern Languages
bioghist.p: Effective in the Fall, 2012, the Department of Modern Languages and the Department of Classics were merged into one department called the Department of Classics and Modern Languages.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This small collection includes minutes, correspondence, and other items. One such item relates to the Marie Geoghegan Modern Language Laboratory once located on the Xavier campus.
